metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4184

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 12 SP1

metadata.Description: Adobe Flash Player before 18.0.0.366 and 19.x through 22.x before 22.0.0.209 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.632 on Linux allows attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via unspecified vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2016-4172, CVE-2016-4175, CVE-2016-4179, CVE-2016-4180, CVE-2016-4181, CVE-2016-4182, CVE-2016-4183, CVE-2016-4185, CVE-2016-4186, CVE-2016-4187, CVE-2016-4188, CVE-2016-4189, CVE-2016-4190, CVE-2016-4217, CVE-2016-4218, CVE-2016-4219, CVE-2016-4220, CVE-2016-4221, CVE-2016-4233, CVE-2016-4234, CVE-2016-4235, CVE-2016-4236, CVE-2016-4237, CVE-2016-4238, CVE-2016-4239, CVE-2016-4240, CVE-2016-4241, CVE-2016-4242, CVE-2016-4243, CVE-2016-4244, CVE-2016-4245, and CVE-2016-4246.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 12 SP1 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP1 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP1 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 12 SP1 is installed
